title: Mike Majkowski 2017 Days And Other Days
description: Mike Majkowski ~ Days And Other Days ~ 2017 Monofonus Press MF133 / Astral Spirits AS038. http://i6.imageban.ru/out/2017/07/23/02197eee5bb6962417964280c8428444.jpg 1 Chapter 9:11 2 Meadow 11:13 3 Matter 14:40 4 Growth 5:46 Mike Majkowski: double bass, analog synthesizer, samples, percussion, piano, field recordings, vibraphone "Days and Other Days' is Majkowski's 7th proper solo release following on the heels of the equally magnificent releases "Bright Astonishment of the Night" on Bocian Records and "Swimming in Light" on Entr'acte Records. Quite possibly the most astounding and darkest (in a good way) album we've heard from Majkowski yet! He continues to explore the intersection between acoustic instruments and electronic sounds. Diving deeper into repetitive structures and their mutations, as well as resonant frequencies of acoustic instruments. Once again this album was recorded & mixed entirely by Majkowski over the course of a few months in 2016 and beautifully mastered by the one and only Lawrence English
